# debugDescription

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the object detector metrics that’s suitable for output during debugging.

## Declaration

```swift
var debugDescription: String { get }
```

## Describing metrics

- **description**: A text representation of the object detector metrics.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the object detector metrics shown in a playground.
